mapper.insert: insert into order_content (id, order_number, vin, car_type, car_color, status, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update order_content set order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_color = #{carColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, order_number, vin, car_type, car_color, status, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_user from order_content where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
